address1: Địa chỉ: 77 Nguyễn Quý Đức, Phường An Phú, TP. Thủ Đức

partnerDetails.about:
East Sea Energy Environment was set up on the passion of founders to create a better everyday condition for society. We focus on energy optimization and environmental control. 
Our aim is to utilize newest technologies from international partners, combining with internal resource and excellent customer experience, and to offer optimal solutions to our clients. Whoever they are, end users, contractors or consortium partners, we provide them with great experience of customer service with a spirit of long-term co-operation.
VISION : 
To be a pioneer technology provider in industrial community who are closely engaged to substantial growth of the society. 
MISSION : 
To turn industrial facilities into ideal operating mode: energy optimization, environmental low-impact, lowest maintenance cost and lowest idle time. 
VALUE : 
  • Enthusiasm - Entire team, shareholders and employees, is always with a genuine enthusiasm to work and live in line with company orientation. 
  • Satisfaction - Customer satisfaction is ultimate object for company activities thorough business phases. 
  • Education - The employees are oriented and educated properly. The customer is clearly instructed to make decision themselves.
